nodes.text: Lasan was a star in the Outer Rim Territories that was orbited by the planet of the same name within its star system.

Lasan was first mentioned indirectly in the Star Wars Rebels chapter book Rise of the Rebels, written by Michael Kogge and published in 2014. In 2017, the star received its name in the thirty-fifth issue of De Agostini's Star Wars Helmet Collection magazine.
